label: High -> High
short_description: Resistance moves horizontally at head or eye height.

label: Mid-Height -> High
short_description: Resistance moves diagonally from chest height up toward the face.

label: Low -> High
short_description: Resistance moves diagonally from the floor up toward the chest or face.

label: High -> Mid-Height
short_description: Resistance moves diagonally from above the head down toward the chest.

label: Mid-Height -> Mid-Height
short_description: Resistance moves horizontally at chest or torso height.

label: Low -> Mid-Height
short_description: Resistance moves diagonally from the floor up toward the stomach/chest.

label: High -> Low
short_description: Resistance moves diagonally from above the head down toward the waist.

label: Mid-Height -> Low
short_description: Resistance moves diagonally from chest height down toward the hips.

label: Low -> Low
short_description: Resistance moves horizontally at waist or hip height.
